availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel B. Moore (Taylor County, Kentucky, Clerk and assistant assessor)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, clerk and assistant assessor. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth W. Shreve Moore in Taylor County, Kentucky, in October 1853. Father of Maggie J. Moore, Elizabeth C. Moore, and Mattie E. Moore. Married to Elizabeth Corn Moore in Mercer County, Kentucky, in June 1864. Clerk in Taylor County in 1860. Assistant assessor in Taylor County. Clerk of Taylor Circuit Court from 1862 to 1866.
